channel.title: Macchiato Monsters, Monsterhearts, Red Carnations on a Black Grave
channel.description: On the new Gauntlet Podcast @DavidMorrison and @Sandy bring on @OnlyAnAlligator - frequent Gauntlet GM & player- to discuss these games as well as The Gauntlet Reading Club and more. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/macchiato-monsters-monsterhearts-red-carnations-on-a-black-grave

item.title: Macchiato Monsters, Monsterhearts, Red Carnations on a Black Grave
item.dc:creator: @seanFsmith
item.description:
@seanFsmith wrote:

Can’t wait to give this a listen! I’m playing in Garbage Barge using MiniBX this week, and I’m looking to get a doppelhander or MM in soon, so this couldn’t come at a better time!
